pierreplansaheadspringletter.text: Hey @,^^I have a new deal with my suppliers this month, so if I'm lucky, they might deliver the summer seeds early! Isn't that great?^^Although, that Draylon fellow said I might not get all of the summer seeds...or enough stock to have them available the whole week...^^^Come on down the shop this week to check, so you can plan ahead! Could be difficult, though!^^-Pierre
